dict.acceptation: 接到，获得；接见，欢迎；[电子学] 接收；[橄榄球] 接球；

sent.orig: Words like" believe" and "receive" are a source of confusion in spelling.
sent.trans: 诸如 believe和 receive 这样的词在拼写上容易混淆。

sent.orig: Receive, receive, ye joy invited, receive, receive, its guile.
sent.trans: 接受吧，接受吧，你的欢乐与你相邀。接受吧，接受吧，上帝真诚地赐福与你。

sent.orig: He that is able to receive it, let receive it.
sent.trans: 这话谁能领受，就可以领受。

sent.orig: Participating students will receive certificate whereas their teachers will receive a certificate and a souvenir.
sent.trans: 参加耆均会获发证书，而老师则可获得一份特别礼品及证书一张。

sent.orig: A wise person is to To let go is actually to receive to receive boundless happiness.
sent.trans: 有智慧的人能舍，能舍就能得，得到无限的快乐。
